title: Gap and Go
objective: Small positive gap + strong first-15m + momentum continuation.
entry_logic: open_gap_z within small band and first15m_range_z in [0.3,1.5] and momentum>0
exit_logic: exit on intraday reversal or ATR trail
caveats: Use small size until validated; avoid illiquid names.
beginner_summary: Trade only when gap size and early session range are supportive.
